subject: NES: Outbound Travel policy offer - Mr Iskandar Kfouri and wife Hana Abou Haidar
body:
Good morning,

Please issue outbound travel insurance policy. Mr Kfouri and his wife are travelling from Lebanon to USA from 2024-12-07 to 2025-01-04 (29 days). 
GOLD PLUS plan, Worldwide excluding country of residence.

Traveller details:
• Mr Iskandar Kfouri
• Mrs Hana Abou Haidar

Passports attached.

Regards
